attributes.action: use athletes apartments to house M.P's after the 2012 games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my opinion that the government should use spare athletes and officials accomodation after the 2012 olympic games for M.P's who need a second base in London.These tax payer funded apartments will already be furnished and are grouped together so it would be a saving on security too.This will save a great deal of taxpayers cash and stop the "snout in the trough" culture that we see today,Call it a free hotel and no expenses needed, the tax payer only need pay for upkeep.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
